summary: The module parses Python kernel functions using abstract syntax tree utilities, expands variable‑length argument lists and unrolls loops, and emits Triton‑compatible source code so that flexible Python kernels can be compiled into high‑performance GPU kernels.
business_intent: Enable developers to write adaptable kernel code in Python and automatically convert it into optimized Triton kernels for faster GPU execution in deep‑learning and other compute‑intensive applications.
